channel.title: VOA News: Arts and Entertainment
channel.description: Up to the minute news from Voice of America

item.title: Nominees Announced for 58th Annual Primetime Emmy Awards
item.description: TNT miniseries Into the Westleads pack with 16 nominations; ceremony to be held August 27

item.title: Depp Returns as Outrageous Captain Jack Sparrow in 'Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest'
item.description: Sequel to 2003 hit swashbuckler inspired by a ride at Disneyland, poses more daunting challenge hero, played by Johnny Depp

item.title: Omar Sharif Honored in Washington for a Lifetime of Bridging Cultures
item.description: For over four decades, the Egyptian actor has sought in his life and in his films to bring harmony to relations between Muslims and people of other faiths

item.title: Anti-Whaling Activists Hold Music Competition
item.description: Internet contest, designed to draw attention to cause, offers free iPod for best music entry using songs of whale in mix

item.title: Native American Basket Weavers Showcased on National Mall
item.description: More than 75 weavers from communities across the United States demonstrate their craft at the Smithsonian Folklife Festival

item.title: Folklife Festival Focuses on New Orleans Music
item.description: 'Been in the Storm So Long,' a series of concerts at the annual Washington event, showcases musicians who weathered Hurricane Katrina

item.title: One Man's Dream Helps Rebuild New Orleans' Hardest Hit Neighborhood
item.description: New Orleans resident Ronald Lewis is optimistically working with volunteers who are rebuilding his museum that showcases the city's special culture

item.title: Fruit Flies Join Astronauts in Space
item.description: Fruit flies will aid in study of immune system in zero gravity

item.title: US Official Expresses Concern Over Loss of VOA, Radio Liberty Broadcast Outlets in Russia
item.description: Broadcasting official says cancellations of programs are "a disturbing trend"

item.title: Smokey Robinson has "Timeless Love" for Pop Standards
item.description: His own hit songs were partly inspired by the Great American Songbook
